long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LeetCode Submission Saver

Boost your LeetCode experience with the LeetCode Submission Saver! This handy Chrome extension allows you to easily download all your accepted submissions as a PDF, ensuring you have a convenient and organized way to review and share your solutions.

Features:
- Effortless Downloads: Save all your accepted LeetCode submissions with just a single click.

- Organized PDFs: Get your submissions in a neatly formatted PDF, making it easy to review your progress.

- Seamless Integration: Works directly on LeetCode.com. Just log in and start saving!

- Privacy Focused: Your data stays secure. The extension uses LeetCodeâ€™s official API to fetch your submissions.


How to Use:

- Install the Extension: Click on 'Add to Chrome' to install the extension.
- Log In to LeetCode: Make sure you are logged in to your LeetCode account.
- Open the Extension: Click on the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.
- Download Your Submissions: Click the 'Download PDF' button and wait for the magic to happen!

- View and Share: Once downloaded, view your submissions in the PDF file and share your progress with others.


Why Choose LeetCode Submission Saver?
- Time-Saving: No need to manually copy and paste your code. Get all your accepted solutions in one go.

- Review Anytime: Have a physical or digital copy of your work to review and refine your coding skills.

- Share with Ease: Easily share your solutions with friends, mentors, or potential employers.

Install LeetCode Submission Saver now and take your coding journey to the next level!
